info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 5:02AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
White River near Centerton down to Hazleton.
Eel River at Bowling Green.
.Widespread ongoing minor flooding along Eel River and the White River from Morgan County down to Knox County...will rise into Moderate Flood levels this morning at most points. Major flood levels are expected to follow in Knox County starting Sunday night. Flooding will crest on points in Clay and Morgan County tonight... and downstream points next week. Major Flooding may last for several days along Knox County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record.
* WHERE...White River at Petersburg.
* WHEN...Until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, A near record flood is in progress. Water level is at a height approached in June 2008 and exceeded in January 2005. Evacuations are necessary. River cabins are destroyed. Great damage occurs to rural county road system. SR 56 begins to flood in the Bowman area. Flooding may damage railroads. Flood waters overtop almost all levees in the Petersburg area.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM EDT Saturday /3:30 AM CDT Saturday/ the stage was 20.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:30 AM EDT Saturday /3:30 AM CDT Saturday/ was 20.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 27.5 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall Wednesday morning. It will rise to 27.6 feet Friday evening. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
To escape rising water, take the shortest path to higher ground.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued this evening by around 815 PM EDT /715 PM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

area.areaDesc: Daviess, IN; Gibson, IN; Knox, IN; Pike, IN
